agentDescription: Cypress end-to-end testing patterns. Use this when task intent aligns with tags: testing, cypress. Use this construction when an agent task matches cypress e2e workflows and the team needs a repeatable, typed analysis contract. It cannot replace full runtime verification and does not guarantee correctness outside the provided input and capability constraints.
